DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a card, gain 1 dexterity this turn only.
Make sure the first element in the NAMES is the same as your PROPER_NAME. The rest is to match keywords like the single word keyword.
Whenever you play a non-attack card, shuffle a Dazed into your draw pile.
A cost skill, which retains, exhausts and fetches one card from your draw pile.
A 0 cost skill, which retains, exhausts and draws 2 cards.
A 0 cost skill, which retains, exhausts and gives 3 Strength for one turn.
A 0 cost skill, which retains, exhausts and gives 3 Strength for one turn.
A 0 cost skill, which retains, and retains 1 card until the next turn.
When drawn, draw 1 less card next turn.
When drawn, draw 1 additional card next turn.
Effect triggers after a certain number of cards are played.
When drawn, Enchants the next Attack you draw. Enchanted cards are played twice for the rest of combat.
Enchanted cards are played twice until the end of combat.
